summary: Implements a Pop2Piano conditional generation model that integrates an encoder, decoder, mel conditioning and embedding layers to produce piano sequences from input features. It offers forward computation, generation utilities, cache reordering, and getters/setters for core components.
business_intent: Provide a ready-to-use AI model for piano music synthesis that can be embedded in virtual instruments, music production software, or interactive media to automatically generate piano performances conditioned on audio or other inputs.
